content: When I'm composing something I often want to narrow to the stream/topic of the topic I'm composing to. What would you think of a "narrow to thread" link to the right of the stream and topic box? Or do we have a good icon for "narrow"?
I think we'd want it to be an icon.
I agree it'd be useful to have a way to do that
That narrow icon can also be put into drafts because a lot of times I want to narrow to the conversation I was having.
I'm wondering if restore-drafts should just always auto-narrow now.
But back to the original topic, I really do like this idea, and an icon is probably fine.
that seems worth opening an issue for
